Topic.Title: Read INTC story pretty sure it will be the same as IBM

Message.Msg: 2 entirely different sectors, so please, don't try drawing any parallels with Intel. IBM may or may not disappoint, but it's certainly not connected to the fortunes of the PC sector

Topic.Title: Read INTC story pretty sure it will be the same as IBM

Message.Msg: The CFO said at the last conference all that contracts were pushed back into this quarter. Typically, this is IBM's best quarter and they will beat on the EPS number...the revenue number is a question this time around... This is not INTC! IBM was quicker than INTC to see the death of the PC, and IBM did something about it!

Topic.Title: 2 Things We All Know Obama Hates: "Colonialism"... and "Capitalism".

Message.Msg: bj, who gives a rats #$%$ about your political assessments. This is a message board for a stock, not an op-ed for clueless dilettantes such as yourself. Go hug Glen Beck.

Message.Title: Donnelly screws up again !! $5.27 on $28.8 B 2013 fy eps outlook $16.50
Message.Msg: Weak server sales blamed for revenue miss Services backlog contracts Weak yen further dampens Japan results Mid-market performance disappointing.
